body:
@sosuke666 WTF? I just read the japanese original and despite some wonky grammar and some minor liberties taken in this translation - in what what is that mistranslated I ask? It's literally the same story. If you can actually read japanese then I dare ask where there the narrative diverges notably from the original.

Pg. 16: "Sawaru dake de iin desu ka?" - "Ho...honto ni ii no ka?"

Pg. 22: "Sore kara ha mainichi densha de otoko wo tsukamaeta"

Again, show me where the story diverges here.
Disagree Noenoen .. I think it was great..!
Typical mistranslations with the narrative to fit their own personal kinks and agendas. Smh.
I think whoever translated this literally just used Google Translate.
